alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Northeast Highlands; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 09 at 2:27AM MST until November 09 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts between 50 and 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains, Eastern San Miguel County, Far Northeast Highlands, Harding County and Northeast Highlands. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Miguel County; Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Northeast Highlands; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
